FARGO N.D PERIOD  Volleyball Head Coach Ray Gooden broke NIUs career wins record with win number  on Friday.The win moved Gooden past Pete Waite former head coach from  to  when the Huskies  defeated Bradley University Friday in straight.. PERIOD

DeKALB  The crosscountry team kicks off their new season after a recordbreaking year in .The Huskies placed fourth in the conference indoor championships last season tying their MidAmerican Conference best at the event.NIU tied their MAC best.. PERIOD
